name: estilo
description: Generate vim color schemes without the hassle

scripts.docs:publish: rimraf _book && gitbook build && cp CNAME _book && cd _book && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'update book' && git checkout -b gh-pages && git add . && git commit -am 'update book' && git push git@github.com:jacoborus/estilo gh-pages --force

author: Jacobo Tabernero http://jacoborus.codes
